summary: This is an email chain from August 11, 2019, regarding technical plans for installing new recording hardware at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The email discusses the transition from old to new recording systems for surveillance channels, with a focus on restoring recording functionality. The context suggests this work was being done shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death at the MCC.

The primary goal is to restore recording to all surveillance channels, with redundancy and PTZ control to be addressed later.
The context implies this activity occurred in the days following Jeffrey Epstein's death at the MCC on August 10, 2019, suggesting a possible upgrade or investigation of facility systems.
SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions is the contractor involved in the surveillance system installation.
